## Overview

The goal is to create a product using prediction algorithm in this application.
- Uses algorithm that predicts the next most probable word after a user enters a phrase
- Built on R and after which deployed to the web server

## Data

The data given was extracted from twitter, blog and news in different languages. The one we are looking at is the English dataset. The dataset is cleaned by removing the:
- Whitespaces
- Numbers 
- Punctuations
- Stopwords 

After which these data are converted all to lower case
